latest_articles.title: Serbian minister, officials on trial over Trump-linked hotel plan
latest_articles.summary: Officials allegedly falsified documents to build a Trump-branded hotel on the bombed former Yugoslav army headquarters site

latest_articles.title: Serbian judges and prosecutors go on strike over laws curbing courts
latest_articles.summary: Students have been demanding judicial accountability for the deadly Novi Sad accident for more than a year
latest_articles.evidence: Serbian judges and prosecutors go on strike over laws curbing courts
